page.title: 11ENTERTAINMENT IN FENCE
page.content:
{SPORTS CLUB :MONDAY,TUESDAY,WEDNESDAY,THURSDAY, 8_11 PM,CLOSED , CLOSED , 8_11 PM, FRIDAY,SATURDAY,SUNDAY. 8_12PM,8_12 PM ,DINNER TIME. IT IS A BIG CLUB IT HAS A JAZZ BAND, POOL TABLE,SNOOKER TABLE,ONE ARM BANDIT,BAR,CRICKET AND FOOTBALL. CRICKET=THERE ARE THREE TEAMS AND IT HAS A GOOD PITCH. FOOTBALL=THERE ARE THREE TEAMS AND A GOOD PITCH. IT HAS A MEADIUM SIZE PAVILION. {SNOOKER CLUB = WHEATLEY LANE SCHOOL. IT HAS TWO FULL SIZED SNOOKER TABLES WHICH SRE IN QUITE GOOD CONDITION.
REALLY THERE IS NOT MUCH ENTERTAINMENT ORGANISED YOU HAVE TO THINK IT UP YOURSELF OR WHEN OLDER GO OFF IN A CAR TO BURNLEY OR OTHER TOWNS.
